name: Musiad Belgium
goal:
As a consulting company mainly for SME companies, our main aims include:
- Assisting our members in expanding their businesses, e.g. as a financial, legal advisor, , and to ensure the information flow that will enhance their competitive power in the domestic and international market and maintain their development trend within this context.
- Producing steady and useful projects while being considerate to CSR values (taking into consideration the resources of the country and the needs of humanity).
- By coordinating the tasks of the financer, producer and the project owner together, we are aiming to go global.
interests: Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, External Relations, Foreign affairs and security policy, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Institutional affairs, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Migration and asylum, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Sport, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives:
- Provide information on incentives, grants, supports and loans provided by public institutions in Belgium.
- Provides mediation support to SMEs.
- Provides legal advisory support (on legal contracts, tax law, insurance law, labour law, brand registration, etc).
- Helps SMEs apply for patents and assists them with any issues with their license.
- Assists them in opening up their business (a physical location in Belgium).
